CustomField.description: The fully qualified name of the Apex class that implements ITriggerActionTelemetryLogger interface. If not specified, the default LimitLogger will be used when telemetry is enabled.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Optional: Specify a custom telemetry logger class that implements ITriggerActionTelemetryLogger. Leave blank to use the default LimitLogger.
CustomField.label: Telemetry Logger Class
